video.name: Quinoa Cauliflower Collard Bowl with Almond Sriracha Sauce | Vegan Richa
video.description:
Flavorful Quinoa Cauliflower Bowl w/ Almond Butter Sriracha Dressing
RECIPE : http://www.veganricha.com/2014/01/quinoa-cauliflower-collard-bowl-with.html

Roast the Cauliflower with Sriracha. Meanwhile Cook the quinoa, saute the Greens, blend up the 8 ingredient Almond Butter Sriracha dressing and serve up a big helping! Free of Gluten, dairy, egg, corn. can be made soy-free.

Easy Quinoa Cauliflower Collard Bowl with Almond Sriracha Sauce 


SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking 

****************************************­*******

Music:

Soul (Vlog Music) by Dj Quads https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads
Music provided by Audio Library https://youtu.be/m0UBmJLv208

recipeIngredient: 1/2  head of large cauliflower or 1 small cauliflower (chopped into small florets)
1 tsp or more Sriracha to taste
4-5  large leaves of collard greens (tough ribs removed and chopped chiffonade)
a generous pinch of salt and garlic powder
3 Tablespoons Almond butter (or use any other nut butter like Peanut butter)
3 Tablespoons coconut milk ((I use So delicious Lite culinary coconut milk_)

itemListElement.text: Wash the quinoa then cook with the rest of the ingredients. Bring to a boil on medium heat then cook at low-medium heat partially covered 10-15 minutes. Fluff and keep ready. Or use 1 cup cooked quinoa or other grain or lentils.
itemListElement.name: Wash the quinoa then cook with the rest of the ingredients. Bring to a boil on medium heat then cook at low-medium heat partially covered 10-15 minutes. Fluff and keep ready. Or use 1 cup cooked quinoa or other grain or lentils.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, mix all the dressing ingredients. Toss the Cauliflower in it. sprinkle a bit of salt and bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 20-25 minutes.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, mix all the dressing ingredients. Toss the Cauliflower in it. sprinkle a bit of salt and bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 20-25 minutes.

itemListElement.text: While the cauliflower roasts, heat oil in the pan on medium heat. Add the collard greens, salt and garlic and cook for a minute. Add the water, mix, cover and cook on low-medium heat until lightly wilted.
itemListElement.name: While the cauliflower roasts, heat oil in the pan on medium heat. Add the collard greens, salt and garlic and cook for a minute. Add the water, mix, cover and cook on low-medium heat until lightly wilted.

itemListElement.text: Add all the ingredients to a blender. Blend well and use. Taste and adjust salt and spice.
itemListElement.name: Add all the ingredients to a blender. Blend well and use. Taste and adjust salt and spice.

itemListElement.text: Arrange everything in a bowl and serve with a generous drizzle of the dressing, cilantro leaves and sesame seeds.
itemListElement.name: Arrange everything in a bowl and serve with a generous drizzle of the dressing, cilantro leaves and sesame seeds.
